QuestData.Title: Sever Their Supply Line
QuestData.Description: The mogu reclaimers are using portals to connect to Kun-Lai Summit, bringing in reinforcements and supplies.$b$bWhat is worse, they are sending their captives through these portals.$b$bGo to the Ruins of Korja and destroy as many of these Korjan Reclaimers as you can find.
QuestData.CompletionText: We cannot hope to beat these mogu if their numbers keep growing.
QuestData.RewardText: You have bought us some much needed breathing room to lick our wounds and prepare a counter-attack.
